summary: A sex bot named Malice is attacked by a creature with tentacles. After it has its way with the bot it destroys it, but Malice comes back to life with the ability to spread life to other bots like a disease.
cast: Yukie Yamada|Daiki Nakamura|Rio Natsuki|Ryôka Yuzuki|Ryouka Shima|Takashi Kondô|Yôko Soumi|Ryûzaburô Ôtomo|Rhiannon Baines|Laurence Bouvard|Annette Edwards|Elisabeth Harmon-Haid|Lee Jones|Michelle Jones|Walter Lewis|Noah Lee Margetts|Chris Peck|Paul Thompkinson|Ann Williams
title: Malice@Doll
